    <facet>

    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">

          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="sl">Valovna posoda</string>
            <string language="en">Ripple Tank</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kräuselung-Behälter</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Réservoir d'Ondulation</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Tanque Do Ripple</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Carro armato dell'ondulazione</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Δεξαμενή κυματώσεων</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Tanque De la Ondulación</string>
          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">V valovni posodi imamo več virov različnega valovanja, ki se med seboj motijo - interferirajo.</string>
            <string language="en">Ripple tank has many different sources of waves that are interfering with each other.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">fizlet</string>
            <string language="en">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">valovna posoda</string>
            <string language="en">ripple tank</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">interferenca</string>
            <string language="en">interference</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kräuselungbehälter hat viele unterschiedliche 
Quellen der Wellen, die einander behinderen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le réservoir d'ondulation a beaucoup de 
différentes sources des vagues qui gênent l'un l'autre.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O tanque do ripple tem muitas fontes diferentes 
das ondas que estão interferindo com se.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Il carro armato dell'ondulazione ha molte sorgenti
differenti delle onde che stanno interferendo con a vicenda.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η δεξαμενή κυματώσεων έχει πολλές διαφορετικές πηγές
κυμάτων που παρεμποδίζουν η μια την άλλη.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El tanque de la ondulación tiene muchas diversas
fuentes de las ondas que están interfiriendo con uno a.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kräuselungbehälter</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Störung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">réservoir d'ondulation</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
